# 本周学习的知识分享
## NSS
###  [BJDCTF 2020]rsa  
```plain
import gmpy2 as gp
import binascii
from Crypto.Util.number import bytes_to_long






e=2
q=gp.gcd(n1,n2)
p1=n1//q
p2=n2//q
phi=(p1-1)*(q-1)
m2="BJD"*32
m2=bytes_to_long(m2.encode())

while e<100000:
    if pow(294,e,n1)!=c1 or pow(m2,e,n2)!=c2:
        e+=1
        continue
    d=gp.invert(e,phi)
    m=pow(c,d,n1)
    print(e)
    print(binascii.unhexlify(hex(m)[2:]))
    break
```

NSSCTF{p_is_common_divisor}

### [SWPUCTF 2021 新生赛]crypto1  
共模攻击

```plain
import gmpy2 as gp
from Crypto.Util.number import long_to_bytes

def CMA(n,e1,e2,c1,c2):
    """共模攻击（输入的n,e,c为gmpy2.mpz()格式）"""
    s = gp.gcdext(e1,e2)
    x = s[1]
    y = s[2]
    if x < 0:
        x  = -x
        c1 = gp.invert(c1,n)
    if y < 0:
        y  = -y
        c2 = gp.invert(c2,n)
    m=(gp.powmod(c1,x,n)*gp.powmod(c2,y,n))%n
    return m,s[0]

flag1= 
flag2= 
n= 
for e1 in range(2,3087):
    if 3087%e1 != 0:
        e1+=1
        continue
    e2=3087//e1
    m,s=CMA(n,e1,e2,flag1,flag2)
    m=long_to_bytes(gp.iroot(m,s)[0])
    print(m)
```

NSSCTF{d64dba66-b608-4255-b888-0b0f25c2f90e}
